pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetvā aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṃ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tāsaṃ vesiyānaṃ ujjhāyantīnaṃ khiyyantīnaṃ vipācentīnaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
